content.raw:
Right, on different ports. So in this example, would you spin up a bunch of concurrently running gzservers, each with different profiles?

I think passing the profile to gzserver is a good idea, but it could be quite inflexible. Can I implement an argument to gzserver and another option for changing the profile while Gazebo is running (probably a new gz physics option)?
content.html:
Right, on different ports. So in this example, would you spin up a bunch of concurrently running gzservers, each with different profiles?

I think passing the profile to gzserver is a good idea, but it could be quite inflexible. Can I implement an argument to gzserver and another option for changing the profile while Gazebo is running (probably a new gz physics option)?
